Header: At least 30 killed in Libya military academy attack
Content: At least 30 people were killed and 33 others wounded in an attack on a military academy in the Libyan capital late, the health ministry of the Tripoli-based government said in a statement. Blood and clothes covered the parade ground where the recruits had been marching. Tripoli, controlled by the internationally recognised Government of National Accord, is facing an offensive by military commander Khalifa Haftarâ€™s Libyan National Army that began in April 2019.
